replies: @jahimes think #TPP is about trade? Wrong! TPP is about expanding and locking in corporate power. #StopTPP
@jahimes Who had access to the #TPP negotiations? 500 corporate trade advisers, while  the public & press were locked out.
@jahimes The #TPP includes rules that make it easier for multinational corporations to send more American jobs overseas! #StopTPP
@jahimes The #TPP requires US to import food that does not meet our standards, threatening our families’ health and safety. #StopTPP
@jahimes The #TPP would threaten our families' health and safety by allowing agribusiness to challenge US food safety inspections.
@jahimes #TPP does NOT work for American workers: A recent TPP study shows the deal would LOWER wages for 90% of Americans.
@jahimes #TPP includes new privileges for multinational corporations that help them offshore more U.S. jobs to low-wage countries.
@jahimes Major enviro groups OPPOSE the #TPP, and 350.org even calls it 'an act of climate denial.' We must #StopTPP!
@jahimes The #TPP would undermine many of the efforts necessary to combat climate change and environmental catastrophe. #StopTPP
@jahimes #TPP threatens internet freedom of expression, privacy and due process, and hinders peoples’ abilities to innovate
@jahimes #TPP would undermine the re-regulation of Wall Street, give big banks new powers to cause the next economic meltdown.
@jahimes Instead of improving the grim conditions facing some workers in #TPP countries, the TPP would make matters worse #StopTPP
@jahimes #TPP is not a trade deal, it’s a corporate powergrab! We must #StopTPP!
@jahimes #TPP is not an issue of left or right, it’s an issue of right and wrong! #StopTPP
@jahimes #TPP is mostly not about trade, it’s about giving multinational corporations “undreamed-of powers” over our economy & our laws
@jahimes #TPP would empower multinational corporations to attack US policies & demand taxpayer compensation for our health, enviro & other laws
@jahimes #TPP ≠ trade. TPP = expanding and locking in corporate power. #StopTPP
@jahimes #TPP gives new rights for multinationals to sue the US gov't before a panel of 3 corporate lawyers for unlimited taxpayer money
@jahimes Think #TPP is about trade? Wrong! Only 6 of TPP's 30 chapters are about trade. TPP is about locking in and expanding corporate power
@jahimes Who had access to #TPP negotiations? 500 corporate trade advisers, while the press and the public were locked out.
@jahimes #TPP would make it easier for corporations to send US jobs overseas, lower our wages, raise meds prices, threaten the environment & more!
@jahimes #TPP rules would make it easier for multinational corporations to send more American jobs overseas! #StopTPP
@jahimes #TPP would lower US wages by forcing US workers to compete w/ workers in Vietnam making less than 65 cents an hour. #StopTPP
@jahimes 9. #TPP requires the US to import food that does not meet our standards, threatening our families’ health. #StopTPP
@jahimes The #TPP would threaten our families' health by allowing agribusiness to challenge US food safety inspections.
@jahimes #TPP would reduce access to life-saving meds in TPP countries and lock in high drug prices here by granting pharma firms monopolies.
@jahimes #TPP is a bad deal for American workers: A recent TPP study shows the deal would LOWER wages for 90% of Americans.
@jahimes Doctors Without Borders calls #TPP the worst trade agreement ever for access to meds. TPP meds rules would hit working & poor people hardest.
@jahimes #TPP includes new privileges for multinational corporations that help them offshore more US jobs to low-wage countries.
@jahimes Major enviro groups OPPOSE the #TPP -- 350.org even calls it 'an act of climate denial.' We must #StopTPP!
@jahimes The #TPP would undermine efforts necessary to combat climate change and environmental catastrophe. #StopTPP
@jahimes #TPP threatens internet freedom of expression, privacy and due process -- and hinders peoples’ abilities to innovate.
@jahimes #TPP would undermine the re-regulation of Wall Street & give big banks new powers to cause the next economic meltdown.
@jahimes Instead of improving the grim conditions facing some workers in TPP countries, the #TPP would make matters worse. #StopTPP
@jahimes #TPP is not a trade deal; it’s a corporate power grab! We must #StopTPP!
@jahimes #TPP means multinational corporations can sue our government if they say our laws violate the new privileges that the TPP grants them.
@jahimes #TPP is not an issue of left or right. It’s an issue of right and wrong! #StopTPP
@jahimes #TPP is mostly not about trade. It’s about giving multinational corporations “undreamed-of powers” over our economy & our laws.
@jahimes #TPP would empower multinational corporations to attack US enviro, health and other laws at the expense of taxpayers
@jahimes We must #StopTPP! #TPP isn't about trade, it's about expanding & locking in corporate power
@jahimes #TPP was negotiated in secret by 500 corporate trade advisers while  press & the public were locked out
@jahimes #TPP's provisions would make it easier for multinational corporations to send more American jobs abroad! #StopTPP
@jahimes #TPP would lower US workers' wages by making them compete w/ workers in Vietnam making less that 65 cents an hour #StopTPP
@jahimes #TPP's would allow agribusiness to challenge US food safety inspection posing a threat to our families' health & safety

@jahimes Doctors Without Borders calls #TPP the worst trade agreement for access to meds that would hit working & poor people hardest

@jahimes Major environmental organizations oppose #TPP & 350.org calls it 'an act of climate denial.' #StopTPP
@jahimes #TPP would undermine our efforts & advances to combat climate change & environmental catastrophe #StopTPP
@jahimes #TPP would gut 'Buy American' & 'Buy Local' policies, sending more US taxpayer dollars abroad instead of reinvesting them here
@jahimes #TPP threatens internet freedom & hinders people's abilities to innovate. #StopTPP
@jahimes #TPP would limit when/how gov'ts can regulate essential services we rely on as water, electricity, health care & more
